tr.t-if: microsilica.compressive_visible and (microsilica.accelerated_pozzolanic_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (microsilica.accelerated_pozzolanic_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl and not fromEln)

microsilica.oversize_retain_visible and (microsilica.oversize_retained_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (microsilica.oversize_retained_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl and not fromEln)

microsilica.specific_gravity_visible and (microsilica.specific_gravity_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (microsilica.specific_gravity_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl and not fromEln)

microsilica.compressive_strength_visible and (microsilica.comp_strngth_7_days_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (microsilica.comp_strngth_7_days_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl and not fromEln)
